alert.note: Alert for Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:36PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pecos, southeastern Reeves, east central Jeff Davis and eastern Ward Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1035 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pyote to 17 miles southeast of Balmorhea Lake. Movement was east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monahans, Thorntonville, Pyote, Wickett, Coyanosa, B F Goodrich Testing Track, Roy Hurd Memorial Airport and Monahans Sandhills State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 221 and 239. Interstate 20 between mile markers 62 and 88. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Davis Mountains Foothills; Pecos; Reeves County Plains; Ward
